ModMetaData.name: JukeBox
ModMetaData.author: NukaFrog GloomyLynx
ModMetaData.description:
Add JukeBox
How to use JukeBox
1. Go to steam workshop content folder. If you've installed it in a different drive, change the drive to match it. C:\Program Files (x86)\SteamLibrary\steamapps\workshop\content\294100\1562235741
2. open \Sounds\Songs Folder and remove All sample Songs 3. Just put in new songs here.
Warning: Don't put in song while the game is running.
